text: Don't let the science fool you. These compact machines are making big changes in agriculture. They are small but powerful, flexible and extremely convenient, perfect for medium and small scale farms. Mini tractors and handheld-arvesters support both eaters. These machines are making farming easier than ever, even on challenging terrains or in type spaces. Discover the small but mighty solutions in agriculture. Thank you everyone for watching the video. Please like and subscribe to learn more fascinating things.
